PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-03922012-04-05TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActPilotage Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the General Pilotage Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the GENERAL PILOTAGE REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure consistency with the Marine Personnel Regulations and their associated marine medical examination standards and certificate of competency nomenclature, and (2) help solve the “exemptions” issue raised by the Auditor General in the Great Lakes Pilotage Authority Special Report of April 2008.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0080 Publication Date: 2012-04-25
AttachmentsAttachment
